name: To The MetaPlane and Back!
description:
A renpy Test turned Project! A story about your adventure trying to get home after you get stuck in a metaphysical plane, you get help from 2 powerful beings to find a way home

Still in a really rough state

My first renpy game so dont expect anything too great

Please tell me if theres any mistakes or problems!

Help from TAPS_the_SERGAL on Ifunny, Thx m8 ;3

UPDATE~ added more to the plot, Fixed parts associated with Copyrights

Also I probably wont update the game again untill its completed or abandoned
